view.swing.sandbox

Interface GridPanel

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GridPanelImpl

    public interface GridPanel
    The tool that can represent matrices as grids.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addListenerToGrid(java.util.function.BiFunction<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Integer,java.awt.event.MouseListener> listenerDispencer)
      Is the method to invoke in order to add an observer to the components of the grid.
      void alterCellSize(int byPixels)
      Alters Cell size value.
      void changeGrid(int horizontal, int vertical)
      Is the method to invoke in order to resize the grid inside the frame.
      void displaySingleCell(int row, int column, java.awt.Color col)
      Is the method to invoke when a single cell changes instead of repainting the whole grid.
      int getGridHeight()
      Is the method to invoke in order to discover the number of vertical cells.
      int getGridWidth()
      Is the method to invoke in order to discover the number of horizontal cells.

      This method notifies a message to the user, in some way.
      void paintGrid(int startRow, int startCol, Matrix<java.awt.Color> colorMatrix)
      Is the method to invoke in order to color up the components of the grid.

    • Method Detail

      • alterCellSize

        void alterCellSize(int byPixels)
        Alters Cell size value. Non-thread safe.
        Parameters:
        byPixels - to add

      • paintGrid

        void paintGrid(int startRow,
               int startCol,
               Matrix<java.awt.Color> colorMatrix)
        Is the method to invoke in order to color up the components of the grid.
        Parameters:
        colorMatrix - is the matrix containing the colors to paint.
        startRow - is the vertical index explaining where the colorMatrix should start being applied.
        startCol - is the horizontal index where the colorMatrix should start being applied.

      • displaySingleCell

        void displaySingleCell(int row,
                       int column,
                       java.awt.Color col)
        Is the method to invoke when a single cell changes instead of repainting the whole grid.
        Parameters:
        row - is the vertical index of the cell
        column - is the horizontal index of the cell
        col - is the color to be set as background for the given cell at (row,column) position

      • addListenerToGrid

        void addListenerToGrid(java.util.function.BiFunction<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Integer,java.awt.event.MouseListener> listenerDispencer)
        Is the method to invoke in order to add an observer to the components of the grid.
        Parameters:
        listenerDispencer - is the BiFunction dispensing the listener.

      • getGridWidth

        int getGridWidth()
        Is the method to invoke in order to discover the number of horizontal cells.
        Returns:
        the width of the grid.

      • getGridHeight

        int getGridHeight()
        Is the method to invoke in order to discover the number of vertical cells.
        Returns:
        the height of the grid.

      • changeGrid

        void changeGrid(int horizontal,
                int vertical)
        Is the method to invoke in order to resize the grid inside the frame.
        Parameters:
        horizontal - is the new number of columns
        vertical - is the new number of rows

      • notifyToUser

        void notifyToUser(java.lang.String s)
        This method notifies a message to the user, in some way.
        Parameters:
        s - the string of the message
